LanguageData.Apparel_UACCsuit.label: UAC nanocarbon suit
LanguageData.Apparel_UACCsuit.description: Nanocarbon suit manufactured by the UAC for security forces and staff in general. Can use conventional fabrics, a product of Union Aerospace ingenuity and efficiency!
LanguageData.Apparel_UACVIPSuit.label: UAC Executive suit
LanguageData.Apparel_UACVIPSuit.description: A protective business suit given to corporate VIPs of the Union Aerospace. Uses nanocarbon technology.
LanguageData.Apparel_UACBusinessSuit.label: UAC business suit
LanguageData.Apparel_UACBusinessSuit.description: A UAC manufactured business suit for those who wish to look formal and professional.
LanguageData.Apparel_UACLabcoat.label: UAC lab coat
LanguageData.Apparel_UACLabcoat.description: A standard issue lab coat given to Union Aerospace research and development staff.
LanguageData.Apparel_UACRavenArmor.label: UAC Raven armor
LanguageData.Apparel_UACRavenArmor.description: Standard power armor used by the UAC for their security forces, the type of armor given for virtual training or real combat.
LanguageData.Apparel_UACSheperdArmor.label: UAC Sheperd armor
LanguageData.Apparel_UACSheperdArmor.description: Standard power armor used by the UAC for their security forces, the type of armor given for virtual training or real combat.

LanguageData.Apparel_UACTrackerArmor.description: Standard power armor used by the UAC for their security forces, the type of armor given for virtual training or real combat.

LanguageData.Apparel_UACFractalArmor.description: Standard power armor used by the UAC for their security forces, the type of armor given for virtual training or real combat.
LanguageData.Apparel_UACLEETArmor.label: UAC Elite armor
LanguageData.Apparel_UACLEETArmor.description: Standard power armor used by the UAC for their elite forces, the type of armor given for virtual training or real combat.
LanguageData.Apparel_UACWildcatHelm.label: UAC Wildcat helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_UACWildcatHelm.description: Standard UAC headgear given to their security forces.

LanguageData.Apparel_UACASPHelm.description: Standard UAC headgear given to their security forces.
